name: Conformance Criteria - Allocate Lot No to ITP and update Lot register
3 - Lot Register/ WBS submitted and approved
4 - Underlying lot & ITP signed off and conforming
Conformance Criteria - Topsoil stripping ITP signed off
Specification Clause - Approved QMP. Approved ITP
5 - Ensure Embankment Construction materials have been approved for use and within specification
○ Soaked CBR = or >3% (STD compaction @ OMC), 1 test per 5,000 m3
Conformance Criteria - Depths of such layers shall not exceed the capability of the proposed plant and in any case shall not exceed 300 mm uncompacted.
Records or Comments - On site verification sheet and survey
7 - Place and compact general fill layer – Subgrade
Conformance Criteria - Material containing a high proportion of large particles may be used in embankments using the Mechanical interlock method of construction.

○ Field density standard minimum Dry density test to be 95%, OMC -1%, +2% with a minimum layer thickness of 150mm and maximum 300mm. Material greater than 600mm may be allowed to be used in the Embankment.
Records or Comments - On site verification sheet, NATA Test report
Conformance Criteria - For subgrades under road/rail pavements and buildings/structures, the materials exposed at the subgrade level of cuttings is to have a minimum CBR of 3.

Conformance Criteria - The embankment will be proof rolled with either Proof rolling shall be undertaken using a 10,000 L water cart or heavy, self-propelled, smooth drum vibrating roller capable of operating in variable frequency modes.
Records or Comments - On site verification sheet

Conformance Criteria - Survey to be completed of the finished surface to confirm to the levels as shown on the drawings with deviations as per Top of earthworks other than the subgrade and pad level ± 50,
Specification Clause - EVAMP001-THS-CV-SPE-0001 Appendix A clause 6
11 - Works completed and updated ITP/ Lot Register/ MDR and close out of GDP
Conformance Criteria - ITP closed. Approved MDR
Approved by THIESS QA Representative / THIESS Project Manager / Client
